title: All You Need is KILL (Edge of Tomorrow) - Hiroshi Sakurazaka
description:
All You Need is Kill (Edge of Tomorrow)
Hiroshi Sakurazaka
Read by Mike Martindale

When the alien Mimics invade, Keiji Kiriya is just one of many recruits shoved into a suit of battle armor called a Jacket and sent out to kill. Keiji dies on the battlefield, only to be reborn each morning to fight and die again and again. On his 158th iteration, he gets a message from a mysterious allyÃ¢â‚¬â€the female soldier known as the Full Metal Bitch. Is she the key to Keiji's escape or his final death?

Ripped from CD and encoded in AAC using the following command:

qtaacenc --tvbr 46 --samplerate keep --highest infile.wav outfile.m4a

I like AAC better than MP3 because it has a better compression ratio without sacrificing quality.

If you need MP3, get ffmpeg and re-encode using one of the following commands (while in the folder containing the audio files):

(Windows)
for /f "delims==" %i in ('dir /b *.m4a') do ffmpeg -i "%i" "%i.mp3"

(Linux)
ls | while read line; do ffmpeg -i "$line" "$line".mp3

I've verified it works in Smart Audiobook Player for Android.
